full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 108 of 247 236 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross 1 Q. I want to ask you a little bit about where you stayed when you flew to Epstein's residences. All right? 2 A. Okay. 3 Q. Now, I believe your home is near Palm Beach; is that right? 4 A. Yes, it was. 5 Q. So when you flew to Palm Beach, you stayed in your home, right? 6 A. Correct. 7 Q. That's where you're based? 8 A. Correct. 9 Q. When you flew to New York, where did you stay? 10 A. The first part of my employment with Mr. Epstein, I stayed in a hotel, but then later on, I was offered to stay at a building he owned, an apartment building on East 62nd or 66th Street. So I had my own apartment. 11 Q. Was that 301 East 66th Street? 12 A. That is correct. 13 Q. Is that where your partner, copilot Dave Rogers also stayed? 14 A. That's correct. 15 Q. And that's an apartment building? 16 A. That is correct. 17 Q. These are basically corporate apartments? 18 A. Correct. 19 Q. Do you know if Epstein owns that building or rents those SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011880
